properties.description: Community Cafe with free tea/coffee every Tuesday 10:30-13:30. Plus delicious pastries, welcoming people, games, art and a gorgeous venue to help you relax. Many weeks our volunteer chef from El Salvador is providing a delicious hot lunch, other weeks we have yummy savoury scones on offer. Rest, Chat, Work, Connect. All welcome. (Check @apvenues on instagram for updated dates & timings.)
properties.title: Adelaide Place

properties.description: Lambhill Stables is a safe, inspiring community hub improving the North of the City for all. Our Cafe is open Monday to Saturday with a fire on. We are open to all and are dog friendly.
properties.title: Alex Woodger

properties.description: Free cafe area for warm space with lunch in part of the Foodbank area
properties.title: Auldhouse foodbank and cafe

properties.description: Our FREE Community Cafe is open as a warm space every Thursday morning, everyone is welcome. We serve hot drinks, hot food & cakes and have card/board games to play and you will be guaranteed a warm welcome.
properties.title: Community Cafe

properties.address: Salvation Army Building, West Dunbartonshire G81 1EA
properties.description: Warm friendly cafe operating on a donation only basis
properties.title: Community Cafe

properties.description: Our space is open to everyone, young or old, those of any faith or no faith. We are a Community Cafe and welcome you all to our warm, safe space to join us and enjoy the company of others and have some hot drinks and food. We will be able to signpost you to other community organisations which you may find helpful. Most of all we look forward to you coming along and enjoying our space and sharing time together.
properties.title: Drumchapel's Warm Welcome Space Cafe

properties.address: Langside Parish Church, Glasgow, Lanarkshire G42 9QU
properties.description: Finn's Place is a community wellbeing center, open to all
properties.title: Finn's Place

properties.description: Come in for a cuppa, a bite to eat and a blether - all for free! All welcome.
properties.title: Gaffe Caff

properties.description: Come and join us for a cup of tea or coffee and something to eat. Come and have a warm welcome and a chat.
properties.title: Immaculate Conception Warm Welcome

properties.description: Our Warm Welcome space will be open every Friday from 11am to 2pm, starting Fri 15th Dec. Totally free and all are welcome. Tea, coffee, rolls, soup, etc. It's a safe, warm place to be with lots of good company. Spread the word and see you there!
properties.title: Knightswood Baptist Church, Knightswood Cross

properties.description: Every Tuesday between 1145-1:30pm we offer hot soup, bread and a cuppa with a diverse array of activities: first Tues Wellbeing; second Tues Death Café; third Tues Games; fourth Tues Imaginative Crafts; and a special event on the fifth Tuesday of the month.
properties.title: LADLE

properties.address: Lodging House Mission, 35 East Campbell Street, Glasgow, Lanarkshire G1 5DT
properties.description: Day centre for those who are over 18 and experiencing homelessness and/or who are socially isolated/lonely. Free hot breakfast and 3 course lunch. Come and eat with us, get involved with the activities we have or access support from our Intervention Worker.
properties.title: LHM360

properties.address: 12 Church Road, Giffnock, East Renfrewshire G46 6JR
properties.description: Tots group and soup cafe on Tuesdays. 10-12.30. Take time meditation group with a light lunch from 1pm on Wednesdays, Cosy Cafe for high schoolers with free hot chocolate and hot snacks. After school 3.00-4.30 also on Wednesdays. Home baking and hot drinks on Thursdays, come along and get involved in our crafty corner or bring what you are working on. 10.00-12.00. Friendly welcome and good chat. All welcome. Our cafe is open for soup/hot drinks on a donation only basis. Warm welcome and friendly chat guaranteed
properties.title: Orchardhill Parish Church

properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 13th January 2024** The space is open to all
properties.title: Paisley Methodist Central Hall

properties.description: Closed

properties.description: Church Hall with easy accesss and toilets for disabled. Parking available Offering free hot breakfast and home cooked lunches. Electric plug points available to use
properties.title: St Gregory's R C Church Hall

properties.address: St. Gregorys RC Church, Lanarkshire G20 8DP
properties.description: Come and join us for some breakfast or lunch or even just a cup of tea. You're always welcome, even just for a chat.
properties.title: St Gregory's Warm Welcome

properties.description: The space is open to all
properties.title: Starbucks Silverburn

properties.description: Fancy joining us for a wee cuppa and a chat? ☕ Come join our 'Wee Cuppas' event at 11am on Tuesdays for a FREE and friendly session. We're super excited that you can join us at our studios for some wellbeing activities and a wee natter. What to expect: Free Tea and coffees Free cakes Guided Meditations Mindfulness Exercises Community We'll begin each week with a relaxation session but after that there is no agenda other than to ignite a wee social spark. Natasha, our host, has over 10 years experience as a health professional and qualified as a transformational coach in 2019. She loves a good natter and cannot wait to get to know you and make you a cuppa.
properties.title: The Wee Retreat CIC

properties.address: Ralston Road, Barrhead, East Renfrewshire G78 2QQ
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 11th January 2024** Come and enjoy a free lunch and a warm welcome here in our Community Hall. We are open on the second and fourth Thursdays of the month. All are welcome.
properties.title: Thursday drop in (starting in January)

properties.address: Pollok Baptist church, 14 Haughburn Road, Glasgow G53 6AB
properties.description: Open from Every Tuesday . We are very inclusive We offer a warm welcome, free cafe, cooking classes and English class. All free.
properties.title: Toasty Tuesday

properties.description: A lovely space where everyone is welcome. It is set up for people and families to come along and enjoy a meal and time together. Kids activities and crafts are set up for the night.
properties.title: Warm Spaces

properties.address: Baker Hall, RUTHERGLEN, South Lanarkshire G73 1JQ
properties.description: Mondays from 11am till 2pm. Drop in for tea/coffee, soup/toasties etc. Get a heat, meet friends, read a book, listen to music or just chill out.
